Title: thor
Description: Project Thor is a community drive project meant to provide people with an opportunity to get familiar with Microsoft's cloud platform by developing a real-world application. Technologies utilized include Windows Azure, SQL Azure, and Exchange Web Services.
HomeWiki:
Project Description:
This is a community driven project meant to provide people with an opporunity to get familiar with Microsoft technologies by building a real world application. Version 1.0 of the application enables users to book conference rooms on the fly by simply capturing a glyphs (Microsoft Tag). Current technologies utilized include:
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2008 SP1
  • Windows Azure
  • ASP.NET MVC 1.0
  • Silverlight 3
  • WCF RIA Services
  • Exchange Web Services
  • Microsoft Tag
Current Status: Version 1.1 has been released. Download it here.
New to Azure? Go to the Windows Azure developer's page
New to ASP.NET MVC? Go to the ASP.NET MVC homepage
New to Silverlight? Go to the Silverlight getting started page
New to WCF RIA Services? Go to the WCF RIA Services getting started page
New to Exchange Web Serivces? Go to the Exchange Web Services Managed API documentation on MSDN
New to Microsoft Tag? Go to Microsoft Tag's home page
Want to get involved? Email adam@thinkfirstcodelater.com. In your message be sure to include your CodePlex username so you can be added to the project team.
Founded by Adam Grocholski
